name: core/clone
description: Utility to deep clone a value. Iterates into objects and arrays cloning each key value pair using the return values of the clonekey and clonevalue callbacks.

parameters.name: clonevalue
parameters.description: Callback accepting an original value and the current key path. Returns the cloned value.

parameters.name: clonekey
parameters.description: Callback accepting an original key and current key path. Returns the cloned key.
